H0.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. Genesis

H1.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. Def Leppard

H2.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. The Police

H3.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. Marillon

A4.text: Sugar Mice and Warm Wet Circles both reached No. 22 as singles, and were part of the album that came sixth in Kerrang! magazine's 'Albums of the Year' in 1987.

A5.text: Clutching at Straws, the album containing 'Sugar Mice', was released in 1987 and marked the end of an era for the band before Fish's departure in late 1988.
